name: Cool Rat 3D: Adventures in the Houseplant Zone
name_original: Cool Rat 3D: Adventures in the Houseplant Zone
description:
Do you have trouble raising plants? Are you unable to meet their constant demands for time, attention, human blood, and armed geopolitical conflict?  Have we have the answer for you- pop your BrainPlugs into the DataGrid and download Cool Rat 3D: Adventures in the Houseplant Zone- the last high-flyin', rock-and-rollin', houseplant-growin' Game Program you'll ever need!

Activities include:

  • Reading mail
  • Jamming out with your best bud
  • Preparing food
  • Putting blood in vials
  • And other cool, legal activities *

So clear out your hard drive and pick up a copy of Cool Rat 3D: Adventures in the Houseplant Zone today!

* Municipal wall faucet may not be legal in some Zones.
